css: @-moz-document domain("2ch.hk"){html{background:url(http://txtrs.ru/uploads/textures/fabric/874949-cd475e1cf9e27fbb333334786a7b1d75.jpg)}body{background:rgba(12,12,12,.7);border:2px solid #000;box-shadow:0 0 10px #000;color:#BBB;font-family:Tahoma;width:77%;margin:auto}.post-message,.nowrap,.news,.posttime,.ananimas,em,.hdescription,.hboardlist .column .boardsubj,.postscontaine,.spoiler,s{color:#BBB!important}.board-banner,#SwitchStyles,.turnmeoff,.moneymoneymoney,.adminbar-bottom,.board-info,#report-form,.rules-area,.kupi-passcode-suka,.footer,.qr-vk-public,footer,.thread_wrap:after,#plashque{display:none}.dropd-board-btn,.dropd-board-list{background:rgba(12,12,12,.8);border-color:#000}.dropd-board-list a:hover{background:#000}#adminbar ul.menu ul{margin:auto}hr{opacity:0}span.spoiler{-webkit-filter:blur(2px);background:transparent;color:#BBB;transition:.2s}span.spoiler:hover{-webkit-filter:none;color:#BBB}span.spoiler a,.thread,.spoiler,s{background:transparent!important}.oppost-wrapper,.reply,.reply.hiclass,.bb,.reply.post,.qr-header,.qr,.postscontainer,.thread_wrap,.addban,.floatforms,#fixed,.topmenu li a.mitem:link{background:rgba(12,12,12,.85)!important;border:1px solid #000!important;border-radius:5px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #000}.bb{border-radius:5px 5px 0 0}.watched-posts-marker{border-left:3px solid #FFA812!important}.reply-posts-marker{border-left:3px dotted #FFA812!important}.desktop,.reflink,a,.a-link-emulator,.orange,.reply-label{color:#FFA812!important;text-decoration:none}a:hover,.a-link-emulator:hover,.orange,.reply-label:hover{text-decoration:underline}.file-attr *{color:#666}.rmenu span.nowrap{display:block}span.adm{background:transparent!important;color:#d250d2;padding-right:0!important}.post .post-title{color:#235b92;font-size:14px}blockquote{margin:10px}[src="/makaba/templates/img/webm-logo.png"],[href="//www.liveinternet.ru/click"]{display:none!important}input,textarea{background:rgba(12,12,12,.8)!important;border:1px solid #000!important;color:#FFA812!important}.reply.hidden-thread-box,.hidden-post-box{width:100%;border-color:#000!important}.post.reply .post-message{max-height:1000px}.content,.board-data,#fixed{width:auto}::-webkit-scrollbar{background:#1e1e1e!important;border:1px solid #252525!important;height:10px!important;width:15px!important}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#FFA812!important;min-height:28px!important}#tabbed ul li,.cloudheader{background:rgba(12,12,12,.8);border:1px solid #000!important}.table .tbody .tr:nth-of-type( even){background-color:transparent}}
